org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.db

クラス DBRecordReader<T extends DBWritable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.RecordReader<LongWritable,T>
      • org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.db.DBRecordReader<T>
  • すべての実装されたインタフェース:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable
    直系の既知のサブクラス:
    DataDrivenDBRecordReader, MySQLDBRecordReader, OracleDBRecordReader

    @InterfaceAudience.Public
@InterfaceStability.Evolving
public class DBRecordReader<T extends DBWritable>
extends RecordReader<LongWritable,T>
    A RecordReader that reads records from a SQL table. Emits LongWritables containing the record number as key and DBWritables as value.

        public void initialize(InputSplit split,

                throws IOException,

        定義:

        パラメータ:

      • getProgress

        public float getProgress()
                  throws IOException
        The current progress of the record reader through its data.
        定義:
        getProgress クラス内 RecordReader<LongWritable,T extends DBWritable>
        戻り値:
        a number between 0.0 and 1.0 that is the fraction of the data read
        例外:
        IOException

      • nextKeyValue

                     throws IOException
        Read the next key, value pair.
        定義:
        nextKeyValue クラス内 RecordReader<LongWritable,T extends DBWritable>
        戻り値:
        true if a key/value pair was read
        例外:
        IOException
